pullRequest.title: Fix focus lost when typing on PBEM screen.
pullRequest.bodyText:
This was caused by MainPanel having two types of observers and a bug introduced in 895115c that caused the wrong one to be called.
This change changes reverts that error and renames the two mechanisms to disambiguate them - one is about setting a new set up panel and the other is about updating the button to start the game.
Also cleans up a use of Observable.

commit.message:
Fix focus lost when typing on PBEM screen.

This was caused by MainPanel having two types of observers and
a bug introduced in 895115c that caused the wrong one to be called.

This change changes reverts that error and renames the two
mechanisms to disambiguate them - one is about setting a new set
up panel and the other is about updating the button to start the
game.

nodes.bodyText: Method setSetupPanel has 29 lines of code (exceeds 25 allowed). Consider refactoring.
